docna.cdata!:
Nepal - Telecommunications Project : Credit
            0166 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Nepal - Telecommunications
            Project : Credit 0166 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project for which the proposed
            credit would be made covers all the works included in the
            Borrowers's program up to July 1973 for the expansion
            of local telephone exchanges and of international and long
            distance communication facilities, the installation of telex
            facilities and the employment of consultants to assist in
            the reorganization of NTB. The project is technically sound
            and well-balanced and NTB will be capable of carrying it out
            and operating the new facilities efficiently.
